snippet: A Montgomery man was convicted of capital murder Tuesday in the shooting deaths of two former Auburn University football players and a third man.
abstract: Desmonte Leonard, Montgomery, Ala, man is convicted of murder in shooting deaths of two former Auburn University football players and a third man, with a jury rejecting claims that he fired in self-defense under Alabama’s Stand Your Ground law.
lead_paragraph: A Montgomery man was convicted of capital murder Tuesday in the shooting deaths of two former Auburn University football players and a third man.

headline.main: Alabama: Guilty Verdict in Deaths of Ex-Auburn Players
headline.print_headline: Alabama: Guilty Verdict in Deaths of Ex-Auburn Players
